rows.label: qev086105_MSG0018
rows.name: Friend is in need of traditional Nopon recipes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0017
rows.name:
There is recipe near and dear to heart of Warawa that
mamapon used to make.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0016
rows.name: Warawa could be convinced to share it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0015
rows.name:
But it will take time to remember every detail.
Warawa must rack brain as quickly as possible
without overheating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0014
rows.name:
Meanwhile, friend should go speak with noted Nopon
cooks like Ngogo or Pirapira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0001
rows.name: Friend is in need of traditional Nopon recipes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0002
rows.name:
All Warawa can offer is the taste of home.
It dish mamapon used to make.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0003
rows.name:
Warawa grew up treated like princess.
Family had money to feast on delicacies every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0004
rows.name: But taste of mamapon cooking was special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev086105_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Warawa to hear more.

rows.label: qev086105_JNK0020
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev086105_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Warawa to just give you the recipe already.

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0005
rows.name: Mamapon grew up commoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0006
rows.name:
One day while mamapon was walking through woods,
ugly critters attacked caravan of dadapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0007
rows.name:
Nopopotamuses and underlings of dadapon were all
injured. It was terrible! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0008
rows.name:
So mamapon made meal of everything caravan had on
hand to nurse them back to health.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0009
rows.name:
Then she beat back nearby critters single-handed and
tamed them to replace missing nopopotamus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0010
rows.name:
When mamapon got back to camp with critters in tow,
dadapon proposed on spot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0011
rows.name: This is amazing recipe dadapon ate that day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0012
rows.name:
Maybe someday prince will ride into town on majestic
nopopotamus and sweep Warawa off feet... *sigh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086105_MSG0013
rows.name:
Please share magical taste of mamapon cooking with
others, friend![ST:wait ]
